detail_desc: Short, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Scarf in soft wool. Size 90x210 cm.

Blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a round, scalloped neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a flounce detail, decorative gathers and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.

Dress in a sturdy weave with a sheen. Slightly deeper neckline at the back, short cap sleeves and pearly buttons at the back. Seam at the waist with a large, decorative bow and a voluminous skirt that is longer at the back. Lined.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, braided shoulder straps. Opening at the front and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.

Spacious, lightweight backpack in functional fabric with a roll-top closure at the top that can be folded down and fastened with a plastic fastener. Adjustable shoulder straps and a zipped inner pocket. The backpack can be folded and stored in its inner pocket when not in use.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a unique nursing feature, V-neck and short, frilled sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top. Long sleeves with a drawstring and frill trim at the cuffs and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening and concealed fastening at the front. Gathers at the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and an elasticated seam with a decorative drawstring under the bust.
